title: Out of memory
body_html:
PyTorch GitHub Issues Guidelines

We like to limit our issues to bug reports and feature requests. If you have a question or would like help and support, please visit our forums: https://discuss.pytorch.org/

If you are submitting a feature request, please preface the title with [feature request].

When submitting a bug report, please include the following information (where relevant):

  • PyTorch or Caffe2: PyTorch
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04
  • PyTorch version: 0.3.1
  • How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda
  • Python version: python 3.6.4
  • CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.0 / 7
  • GPU models and configuration: GTX 1080 Ti
  • GCC version (if compiling from source):
  • CMake version:
  • Build command you used (if compiling from source):
  • Versions of any other relevant libraries:

In addition, including the following information will also be very helpful for us to diagnose the problem:
Running https://github.com/pytorch/examples/blob/master/imagenet/main.py#L10 changed the model to the GoogLeNet. Even batch_size=10, out of memory.

THCudaCheck FAIL file=/opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1522182087074/work/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu line=58 error=2 : out of memory

body:
PyTorch GitHub Issues Guidelines
--------------------------------

We like to limit our issues to bug reports and feature requests. If you have a question or would like help and support, please visit our forums: https://discuss.pytorch.org/

If you are submitting a feature request, please preface the title with [feature request].

When submitting a bug report, please include the following information (where relevant):
- PyTorch or Caffe2: PyTorch
- OS: Ubuntu 16.04
- PyTorch version: 0.3.1
- How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda
- Python version: python 3.6.4
- CUDA/cuDNN version: 9.0 / 7
- GPU models and configuration: GTX 1080 Ti
- GCC version (if compiling from source): 
- CMake version:
- Build command you used (if compiling from source):
- Versions of any other relevant libraries:

In addition, including the following information will also be very helpful for us to diagnose the problem:
Running https://github.com/pytorch/examples/blob/master/imagenet/main.py#L10 changed the model to the GoogLeNet. Even batch_size=10, out of memory.

THCudaCheck FAIL file=/opt/conda/conda-bld/pytorch_1522182087074/work/torch/lib/THC/generic/THCStorage.cu line=58 error=2 : out of memory
